mention.text: increasing trade ties between the two groups
the cartagena agreement board , a technical-community integration organization
the political agreements that were adopted by the andean-european joint commission in the meetings held in brussels in april
the generalized preferential rates system that is implemented by the eec , the establishment of activities to promote trade , and the development of andean exports
the establishment of activities to promote trade
andean exports , which in 1988 totaled $ 3.847 billion
the chief of the eec delegation
this deficit in andean trade , which has not been recorded since 1982 , when the foreign debt crisis exploded in andean group countries
